title: Diary of Steve the Noob 15 (An Unofficial Minecraft Book)
description: 18,000 words with 30 pictures. Whuuuuut? I don't even know... #15 is finally here! Sorry for the delay, but here it is, my longest book ever. :) Have fun reading #15. It is about to get interesting is all I'm gonna say... :D This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book. It is not endorsed, authorized, licensed, sponsored, or supported by Mojang AB, Microsoft Corp. or any other entity owning or controlling rights to the Minecraft name, trademarks or copyrights. author: Steve the Noob
